page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT -GENERAL
page.content: {Industry in the area (a)Hughes'Tool Company -equipment for oil rigs-28 employees (b)Henry Campbell Ltd.(Mossley Mill) textile manufacturing-460 employees {Industry convenient to the area Most people travel out of the area to work for example to (a)Standard Telephones & Cables Ltd. electronics - (1500 employees) (b)Camco Ltd.-oil rig equipment (323 employees) {Farming}- some people work on the farms in the Carntall and upper Monkstown areas. {Ancillary workers}-Many people find employment in service industries-see page 12 {Employment in the Belfast area Since the district is within easy commuting distance from Belfast many find employment in the city.
